include.name: Roy Price
include.title: Amazon Studios president
include.accusation: Accused of sexually harassing a producer of "The Man in the High Castle."

include.name: Oliver Stone
include.title: Hollywood filmmaker
include.accusation: Accused of groping a woman, and embarassing another women in a "horrid" audition.
include.result: Stone denied wrongdoing in the audition, and hasn't spoken on the groping.

include.name: Bob Weinstein
include.title: Hollywood producer
include.accusation: Executive producer of "The Mist" accused him of harassment.

include.name: Lockhart Steele
include.title: Vox Media editorial director
include.accusation: Eden Rohatensky, a former Vox web developer, accused "one of the company's VPs" of sexual misconduct. Vox said Steele, their editorial director,admitted to it.")

include.name: Robert Scoble
include.title: Tech blogger
include.accusation: Accused by multiple women of sexual misconduct.

include.name: David Blaine
include.title: Magician
include.accusation: Accused by one woman of rape, and another for sexual assault.

include.name: Gilbert Rozon
include.title: Comedy festival founder
include.accusation: Several women accuse Rozon of sexual misconduct and aggression.
include.result: Rozon steps down as head of the Just for Laughs festival.

include.name: Chris Savino
include.title: Television show creator
include.accusation: At least 12 women allege sexual harassment and inappropriate behavior.

include.name: Twiggy Ramirez
include.title: Bassist and guitarist for Marilyn Manson
include.accusation: Accused of rape and abuse by former girlfriend, Jessicka Adams.

include.name: Zain Jaffer
include.title: CEO of the startup, Vungle
include.accusation: Arrested for assaulting and sexually abusing his 3-year-old son.
include.result: Fired, charged with several felony counts.

include.name: James Toback
include.title: Director
include.accusation: Accused by more than 300 women for sexual harassment.
include.result: Toback denied the allegations to the L.A. Times.

include.name: Terry Richardson
include.title: Fashion photographer
include.accusation: Accused of sexual misconduct and sexual exploitation of models.
include.result: Denied the allegations, was dropped by Cond√© Nast International.

include.name: Leon Wieseltier
include.title: Former literary editor at The New Republic
include.accusation: Several former New Republic employees allege sexual harassment.
include.result: Backers pulled the plug on his new magazine.

include.name: Ethan Kath
include.title: Co-founder of the band Crystal Castles
include.accusation: Former singer, Alice Glass, accused him of rape and abuse.

include.name: Knight Landesman
include.title: Publisher of Artforum magazine
include.accusation: Sued by at least 9 women for sexual harassment.

include.name: George H.W. Bush
include.title: 41st President of the United States
include.accusation: Accused of inappropriate touching by several women.

include.name: Mark Halperin
include.title: Political journalist, "Game Change" co-author
include.accusation: Accused of sexual harassment while political director of ABC News by 5 women.
include.result: Dropped by NBC and MSNBC, book deal cancelled, HBO miniseries scrapped.

include.name: John Besh
include.title: Chef
include.accusation: 25 women alleged that the chef fostered a culture of sexual harassment.

include.name: Ken Baker
include.title: Senior E! News correspondent
include.accusation: 2 women allege sexual harassment.

include.name: Rick Najera
include.title: Writer and producer
include.accusation: Accused of making inappropriate comments.

include.title: Writer and producer
include.accusation: Accused of making inappropriate comments.
